title: Dpia
description: The description of the some data related to the data protection impact assessment (DPIA) established for the processing according to article 35 GDPR

path.description: The path to the DPIA document

description.description: A brief resume of the results of the DPIA

stopDate.description: The date of the DPIA or the last update of the DPIA

hasPriorConsultation.description: Informs whether the processing has been subject to a prior consultation obligation according to article 36 GDPR
